title: Transfer between TR->EUNE
body: I bought a transfer for my tr account to eune, it has now been over 6 hours since I did it.  It should be instant at least by the information I've got but how long might it take at max? Last time I did a transfer it took 2 hours max. I'd really like to play on it asap.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: i have the same issue, i cant even login to my account anymore apparently the details are incorrrect?

It doesn't look like there's a transfer going through for this account right now so I'm assuming you're referring to a different one, but sometimes accounts can get stuck in the transfer process. No worries though, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to get it pushed through pretty quickly.
No worries anymore, I got my transfer through. Shop hadn't taken my purchase and didn't take my transfer, so I only had to just buy it again
